name: Code Unlocker
description:
Code unlocker is a game when you have to guess the answer and unlock the phone!
The game will be playing on Mobile and on PC.

Code unlocker have 20 levels, but in another update arrive more levels!
Write a comment if the game is good!

----------------HOW TO PLAY AT CODE UNLOCKER------------------

Ex: Is T00 Sl0w!, answer: 000 (Because the o of word Too and Slow is a zero!)

----------------VERSION LOG OF CODE UNLOCKER------------------

Version 1.0.1b1 (12/01/2022):

FIXES:

-Fix problem to go to menu (Touch: Hold touch, Keyboard: Esc).
- Fix English Grammar Descriptions
-Fix the "Enter" Keyboard command.

IMPROVEMENTS:
- Removed the button "Settings"
-Add 5 More Levels
-Modify the commands of "Help" Screen

Version 1.0.1b1.2

-Fix orientament of Mobile Phones (to Landscape at Portait)

V. 1.0.1u3 (Official Version!)

- Fix Orientament on Mobile Phones (to Portait at Any).
- Added UNLIMITED PLAY(Unlock when you finish the game).
- Fix Loading Time

V. 1.0.1u3.1
